# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am offering this exceptional product to you at an introductory special price of $140. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
